description:
Adult form of http://anidb.net/ch10080 [Vivio].
Vivio appears like this after http://anidb.net/ch21148 [Jail Scaglietti] merges her with a Relic in order to get her to activate the Saint`s Cradle.
Her appearance is that of Sankt Kaiser Olivie Segbrecht, the last Sankt Kaiser of old Belka to use the Saint`s Cradle, whose DNA was used to clone Vivio.
In the manga sequel she assumes this form while having her Intelligent Device equipped.
name: Sankt Kaiser Vivio
